name: Yawen Packard
description: Yawen Packardis a medical doctor assigned to anNCPD-contracted laboratory inHeywood. Yawen Packard is an acclaimed medical professional specializing in neuroscience. She is currently working in the field of pediatric autism, augmenting children's brain waves withbraindancetechnology. Due to the specific nature of accessing thoughts and memories that would otherwise be locked out, the NCPD contracted her lab to help with the investigation of thePeter Pan case, wherethe suspectsuffered a bullet wound and ended up in a coma prior to being able to reveal any information regarding his victims.
